topic.title: Disable Context-Sensitive Menu Items for Custom Author Actions

section.title: Question
section.p: Is there a way to disable menu items for custom Author mode actions depending on the cursor context?

section.title: Answer
section.p: By default, does not toggle the enabled/disabled states for actions based on whether or not the activation XPath expressions for that certain Author mode action are fulfilled. This is done because the actions can be many and evaluating XPath expression on each cursor move can lead to performance problems.
